description: Grapefruit is the secret ingredient in this zingy prawn ramen.
name: Spicy Prawn Ramen Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5cm ginger, peeled and sliced into matchsticks
4 medium spring onions, sliced, tops reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a deep pan on medium heat and cook the mushrooms for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, ginger and half of the chilli and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in the miso paste and cook for 1 minute.
Pour over the stock, bring to the boil and reduce the heat. Simmer for 10 minutes.

Bring the soup back to the boil, add the noodles and bok choi cook for 4 minutes, stir in the spring onions and prawns and cook for 3-4 minutes until the prawns are cooked through. Season with soy sauce and grapefruit juice to taste.
Serve in bowls with chilli and spring onion tops scattered on top.
